Um, yeah, significant? Try, uh, double. And nobody told me anything...
Right. Right. I see. The increase. From eight hundred. To sixteen hundred monthly. That's—I mean that's definitely—wow. I'm really. Really sorry. About that.

Industry-wide? What's that even...
Basically. Tree trimming. High risk category. Updated last quarter. The memo MEM-Q3-2024 shows, um, increased claims across the board so everyone in code CAT-77B got adjusted.
Um, okay but like, I haven't had any claims, so...

No no you're right! You're absolutely right and that's, um, that's actually good because I think—wait let me—okay so with your clean record I can probably submit form FRM-8823-RC for a, uh, a review and maybe get you some kind of discount applied.

Typically? Five days. But. But! I could—hmm—I could mark it priority. Code PRI-EXPRESS. That drops it. To maybe. Two days? Three max.

Already doing it! So I'm, um, entering the priority request right now under ticket TKT-99412-X and, uh, I'm also gonna add a note about the missing notification because that's—I mean that's on us and maybe that helps your case.
Okay so, um, what happens if they say no?

Well. Honestly? I think—I mean I probably shouldn't say this but—with your record and our, um, our mistake on the notice, I'd be really surprised if they don't at least offer something. Case number CSE-7749-LP for your reference.
Um, alright. Thanks for, uh, actually helping instead of just... you know.

Of course! Of course! And hey—I'm putting my direct extension EXT-4491 in your file notes so, um, if you need to follow up just ask for me directly and I'll, uh, I'll make sure we get this sorted out properly.
